name: Quick Maths (Skully B)
description:
Attempted to make for the October 2017 0 hour game jam.
Wasn't able to complete within an hour, instead the main game was completed within 1.5 hours. I then added some audio and made a few adjustments to make it easier to play.

The aim of the game is to try to correctly pass in the number required to complete the sum that is displayed. You get 100 points for every correct answer and -10 points for any wrong ones. You have only 1 minute to try to get as many correct answers as possible. The game will randomly choose between addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.

There's a rudimentary highscore system for you to challenge yourself.

You can click the buttons to enter the correct number or use the numpad on your keyboard. Escape will quit to the main menu and escape from the main menu will close the game.
